@Harmo801 Look forward to seeing what you create for your first LD :) Send it our way and we'll play + rate! GLHF :D
@cooopa We nap for a few hours in the Jam, can be quite hard :') Energy drinks help, but if you go OTT you'll feel it for days :p GLHF
@Papelou Nice to see you're back for more this LD :) Send us your game when it's up & we'll play + rate :) A rhythm game would be cool!
@cooopa Indeed! Lets hope it's a good one :) Lots of sleep before, lots of energy drink during & lots of playing + rating games after! :D
@cooopa Sure you'll love it! :D This will be our 4th jam, it's been so much fun each & every time we can't help but come back for more! :)
@moltenbear Great to hear you're getting stuck in this LD :) Send us your entry when it's live and we'll play + rate :D
@cooopa Look forward to seeing what you create, especially with less time than most :O Send it our way when it's up and we'll play + rate :)
@bigbuggames Look forward to seeing what you guys produce for your 1st LD! Send a link when it's uploaded & we'll be sure to play + rate :)
@erlendaakre just tried SpaceMurderKill, nice one! Excited to see what you make for LD, send it over when it's live & we'll play + rate ;)
@vircung Do any devs know what they're doing? :') Look forward to seeing your entry, send it our way & we'll be sure to play + rate :)
@devmarth Wow! Sounds good. We hope to turn one of our entries into a full game at some point too! :D Good luck to you :)
@devmarth Great to hear you're getting involved this LD Presto! :D Link us your game & we'll make sure to give it a good play + rate (:
@jackrugile Great to hear you're entering LD33, send us your entry when it's done & we'll make sure to play + rate :)
Ludum Dare 33 is just over a week away! :o We've already booked the time off work - have you? Get involved! :D #LDJAM #IndieDev #GameDev
